name: Create Darkness
description: You remove all intensities of natural light in the targeted zone.

name: Induce Fear
description: All entities within the area must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target gains the Fear: Shaken state with you as the object of their fear. This state does not stack with other sources of Fear. The effects of this spell last until the End Phase.

name: See in Darkness
description: A target gains the Natural Dark Vision feature.

effect: A target instead gains the Superior Dark Vision feature.

name: Dark Barrier
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. This barrier possess the Imbued trait. The barrier has Damage Weakness to light damage.

effect: The barrier is immune to attacks using the Physical Damage Group that do not have the [@trait Imbued @] trait.

name: Concealing Shadow
description: You gain a power bonus to Stealth Checks. This power bonus also applies to Magic Appraisal Checks make to hide your Mana.

name: Armor of Darkness
description: You gain a natural AV against Force and Darkness Damage Types and half as much against the Physical and Elemental Damage Groups.

name: Rebuke Light
description: The first time time a light elemental enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, it must make a SR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected and does not need to repeat the Resistance Check for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Success.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes 20 force damage per Degree of Failure. If the target uses the Rex Damage Role, the final damage is multiplied by their Rex Multiplier.

description: This spell also blocks any natural light within zone.

name: Hide Mana
description: Choose a spell or a supernatural quality of an entity. Any Magic Appraisal Check made to detect or measure the target suffers a power penalty. Attempts to detect this spell also suffer the power penalty.

name: Shadow Beam
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes darkness damage.

name: Zone of Darkness
description: All entities within the zone gain the following benefits:increase the difficulty of being detected by a Detect Spirit or vision based Difficulty Skill Check by two degrees. Perception Checks suffer a -4 deed penalty.

items: Increase the Difficulty of any Detect Spirit and vision based Skills Checks by two degrees
Perception Checks suffer a -4 deed penalty
Detection powers targeting the target reduce their Resistance Check by 4

name: Chains of Shadow
description: Make a Trap maneuver using the listed Strength against the target. The chains are material and have a Fortitude of 25 but have the Imbued trait and can only be sundered by an object with the Imbued trait.

name: Control Darkness
description: You can perform the following actions while you maintain the spell:

description.name: Control Creature of Darkness
entries: You can gain control over a darkness elemental within the zone. The target must make a SR Check.

entries.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this action for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Success.

entries.name: DoF 1+
entries: You gain active control over the target. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. If the target ever leaves the zone or the spell ends, your control ends.

description.name: Modify Shadows
entries: You can change the shape of shadows.

description.name: Redirect Darkness
entries: You can take this reaction when an attack using Darkness Damage passes through the zone, it suffers `D2` on the Offensive Roll.

name: Concealment
description: The target gains a power bonus to Resistance Checks against detection powers and to Conceal Spirit Checks.

name: Obfuscate
description: The target's final skill value for Stealth and Conceal Spirit becomes the listed value if it better than the current value.

name: Enrage
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target gains the Rage state and a +1 deed bonus to Offensive Rolls. But, the target also suffers a -3 deed penalty to all other Skill Checks. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check. The spell only ends when you stop maintaining it.

name: Banish Positive Emotions
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target cannot feel positive emotions for one minute per Degree of Failure. The effects of this spell do not require maintenance.

name: Night
description: You create a dome of supernatural darkness. All entities, except you, cannot see through the darkness unless they make an Inhuman (32) Notice Check or an Almost Impossible (24) Search Check or possess the Superior Dark Vision feature. An entity that cannot see through the darkness and is within it applies the Partially Blind state.

name: Seeking Shadow
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes Darkness Damage and the spell ends.

If the target dodges, the spell places itself next to the target. You can make another Offensive Roll with the spell next round by taking the Use an Active Power action. The range of the spell is considered from the new location. If the target blocks, the spell is hit with an Imbued attack, or you stop maintaining the spell, the spell ends and it cannot make any more Offensive Rolls. You can use your Spell Projection to dodge any attack targeting the spell.
You can choose to stop controlling the spell. The spell will then act on its own Initiative Roll of 0. The Offensive Rolls and Defensive Rolls of the spell uses the listed final roll.

name: Zone of Concealment
description: Any entity with the zone gains a deed bonus to Resistance Checks against detection powers. Any Detect Spirit or Magic Appraisal Checks made to locate an entity within the zone suffers a deed penalty.

name: Enter Another's Nightmare

target.target: one sleeping creature within jump range

description: The target must make a SR or MR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends and the target is immune to your casts of this spell until falling asleep again.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You physically enter the nightmare of the target. You have no control over the nightmare and anything that happens there is real to you. You return to the material plane near the current dreamer when the spell ends or when the dreamer wakes up, dies, or has their nightmare become a pleasant dream.

While you are in the nightmare, you can jump to the nightmare of another creature within jump range. The new target must make a SR or MR Check. If the new target succeeds, you remain in your current nightmare.

If you enter a nightmare that overlaps with the Veil, you do not return to the material plane when the spell ends. If you jump to another nightmare that does not overlap with the Veil before the spell ends, you can return normally.
If you die in the nightmare, you body remains in the targets nightmares.

name: Shadow Form
description: The target gains the Immaterial and Imbued traits and can choose to interact with material entities at will. The target also gains a power bonus to Stealth Checks and half that to Resistance Checks against darkness-based powers. Lastly, the target doubles the Final Damage from any attack using the Light Damage Type.

effect: As intermediate degree but the Resistance Check bonus applies to any Resistance Checks not against light-based powers
As advanced degree but the target does not take additional damage from Light Damage

name: Bane
description: All entities within the zone must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this casting of the spell.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target suffers Disadvantage on Skill Checks and Resistance Checks. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. A target cannot be affected by more than one Bane spell at a time.

name: Create Negative Feeling
description: All entities within the zone must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this casting of the spell.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is filled with negative feelings. Any Resistance Check or Composure Check to prevent Fear, Pain, Rage, or any other negative emotion suffers D1. A target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed.

name: Erase Traces
description: The target has any trace that it was in the area erased. This eliminates any natural and unnatural sign that the target was here. This does not erase traces from time until cast at the advanced degree.

effect: Eliminate traces of the target in time.
As advanced, but you can erase traces of all activity in the whole area.

name: Shield from Positive Emotions
description: The first time time a light elemental or an entity composed of positive emotions enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, it must make a SR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected this round.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes 10 atomic damage per Degree of Failure and gains the Pain (4) state. The Pain state lasts until the target leaves the zone, but the target can only be subject to the Pain once from any Shield from Positive Emotions spell. If the target uses the Rex Damage Role, the final damage is multiplied by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Dark Gate
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. You can perform the Gate of Mana action while you maintain the spell.

description.name: Gate of Mana
entries: You can take this reaction when you obtain at least 1 Degree of Success on a Defensive Roll with a Dark Gate against a spell. You can make a Power Collision using the listed Base Damage. On a failure, the attacking spell dissipates into nothing.
On a success, you absorb half the Mana Cost of the attacking spell.

name: Devastate
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected and the spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target gains the Pain state equal to the Degree of Failure. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check, the effects last as long as you maintain the spell.

name: Mark of Fear
description: All targets must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this cast of the spell.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target gains the Fear: Terror state, with the pattern being the object of fear. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.

name: Catastrophic Night
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target takes Darkness Damage.

name: Dark Material
description: You create an object whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value or twice your Presence. The object's quality bonus can be no greater than the listed value.

name: Travel by Shadow
description: All targets are instantly transported to a point of your choosing. If the destination is beyond the listed distance or blocked by an Imbued entity, the spell fails. The spell also fails if you are not in contact with a shadow at the time of casting or if there is no shadow where you intend to end up. You must have a general idea of destination, but do not need to be able to see it.
A target is informed if it would would be transported into an unnatural position, such as in the air with no Flight Value.

name: Lord of Nightmares
description: The entity whose dream you are in must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You gain control over the nightmare as if you had Nornir 45 -- all other benefits of Nornir do not apply. If the target is having a pleasant dream, you instead only have Nornir 30. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.
The spell ends if you return to the material plane. If you jump to a new dream, the dreamer can make a Resistance Check.

effect: If you are in the Veil and in an area of negative emotion, you can control your surroundings as if it were a nightmare. Neutral areas and areas of positive empotion use the reduced Nornir. This does not work if there is a creature with similar or greater levels of Nornir nearby.

name: Create Creature of Darkness
description: You create a monad creature. The creature's level can be no greater than the listed value and must follow the rules for monad creatures. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creature is a darkness elemental with Nornir 20.

name: Concealment from Magic
description: An entity of your choice cannot be targeted by trigger spells of the listed degree unless the caster is in control of the spell, in which case treat it as an effect spell.
For example, you cannot be targeted by the Mark of Fear since the caster has no control over it. But a Flare spell can affect you if the caster makes an Offensive Roll against you.

name: Kingdom of Darkness
description: You create a dome of supernatural darkness. While you are in the zone, you gain a +4 deed bonus to Resistance Checks against detection powers and any attempt to locate you requires an Inhuman (32) Notice Check, Inhuman (32) Detect Spirit Check, or Impossible (28) Search Check. If you perform the Accumulate For A Prepared Spell for a spell of the Darkness path, you gain a +20 power bonus to your Mana Accumulation.
All entities, other than you, in the zone lose 10 mana and 1 ki each turn on the End Phase. Light elementals lose twice as much.
You can also use 5 feet of distance to step into the darkness and reappear anywhere else in the zone.

name: Undetectable
description: You are completely immune to certain detection powers and abilities.

effect: You are invisible to detection spells and phenoms
As base, you are also invisible to Detect Spirit and detection talents
You are invisible to all detection powers

As advanced, you are also completely invisible to the natural senses. Any Opposed Check applies the Totally blind state unless the opponent makes an Inhuman (32) Notice Check or an Impossible (28) Search Check. Even on a success, the opponent applies the Partially Blind state.

name: Prison of Shadow
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is sent to a pocket dimension that takes the form of a dark glass bead. The target target is completely unable to observe what happens outside the pocket dimension. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check. The spell only ends when the spell is no longer maintained or the bead is broken.
The bead can be damaged from outside or from within by an attack with the Imbued (18) trait. The bead uses the Rex Damage Role -- it has Absorption 10 and Regeneration 19.

description: An entity outside the bead can use the Project into the Pocket Dimension action to communicate with the entity held inside.

description.name: Project into the Pocket
entries: When you take this intention you must make a Focus Check of 15. If you fail, you lose all your AP and become Flat-Footed. If you succeed, you form a projection of yourself within the pocket dimension in front of the entity held within. For each degree of success, you can maintain this projection for one minute. You must take this intention each round you wish to control the projection.
The projection can speak, see, and hear what happens within the bead and can move around with a Flight Value equal to your Focus. This projection is otherwise a figment that requires active control.

effect: The prison cannot be damaged from the inside

name: One with the Darkness
description: You enter a state of meditation in which your body becomes one with the darkness. You leave this world and travel to the Nexus to nourish yourself with the energies found there. While there, you are only aware of your own body; the passage of time is meaningless. Your Mana Recovery is multiplied by 10 and you gain a physical and spiritual Regeneration Value of 16. While there there is no maintenance cost, you can remain in the Nexus for the listed time, you can try to leave early but there is a 50% chance it will take you the entire time.

name: Dark Ascension
description: The target gains the listed Nornir value and the Divine feature.

name: Tenebrae Onslaught
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target takes Darkness Damage. The attack has the Flowing and Immaterial (20) traits. A target that takes any damage must make a SR Check. If the target is reduced to zero or fewer Life Points, the target automatically fails the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected, but still takes the damage.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is lost in the darkness. Their body and soul are completely destroyed.

description: This spell cannot select targets, even if another power would allow you to; everyone in the area, but you, is equally affected.
